commitMessage:
@@@[CALCITE-3334] Refinement for Substitution-Based MV Matching (Jin Xing)

This patch proposes to refine existing implementation by:
- Canonicalize before MV matching.  through which we can significantly simplify
  the algebra tree and lower the difficulty for materialization matching.
- Separate matching rules into two categories and enumerate common matching
  patterns which needs to be covered by rules.

Design doc:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1JpwGNFE3hw3yXb7W3-95-jXKClZC5UFPKbuhgYDuEu4/edit#heading=h.bmvjxz1h5evc

Close #1451

@@@[CALCITE-4199] Add nullability annotations

The commit includes javadoc updates and refactorings made by Julian Hyde in https://github.com/apache/calcite/pull/2278
@@@[CALCITE-3935] Enhance Join-Materialization.  support to pull-up filters under join of left or right (xurenhe)
